data.name: Agri-Tycoon
data.detailed_description:
A throwback to the old school farming simulators where you focus on building and expanding a farm while producing crops and breeding livestock. Keep an eye on your expenses and follow market trends to sell at the right time and become the ultimate agricultural tycoon.

Procedural map generator for endless variety in terrain. Choose climate conditions and terrain options to change how hard or easy the gaming session will be.

Buy farming vehicles and implements to keep your farm running smoothly. Build barns, stables, silos, greenhouses and various other structures to assist in your farm’s growth.

Choose from a wide selection of crops to plant and livestock to tend. Deal with pests, weeds, disease and the elements to grow the best in class crop and livestock or risk failure.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7600K/ AMD Ryzen 5 1400 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 580/ Radeon HD 8970M or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Tested on Ubuntu and Arch. Should run on common distros
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7600K/ AMD Ryzen 5 1400 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 580/ Radeon HD 8970M or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
